attributes.action: Scrap the Olympic 2012 Brand and come up with a new one which represents the people of this great country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The £400,000 spent on branding the 2012 olympics would have been better spent if the board had consulted with the people instead of an advertising agency. What we're left with is an outdated, ugly, crass symbol for the 2012 olympics which will go down in history as the worst Olympic brand ever. I want it to be re-branded and very quickly too!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
